reviewText: What an interesting, educational, and entertaining video!  I can't recommend it highly enough.  My only disappointment was that the young man who was the recipient of this piano seemed rather casual about it and how long he might enjoy it! Perhaps it was his youth speaking.

Miracle in a Box is an inspiring film about the coming together of three events: the bequest of a grand piano, the student competition to win it, and the months and months of work required to make it sing again. The acclaimed actor John Lithgow narrates this film by Oscar-winning documentary film-maker John Korty. NOTE: This same product, brand new, is available for substantially less than offered here! Please visit the film's website: [...]
